item.title: Black Belt Test Nov 2022
item.description: Hello everyone, I just wanted to confirm the Nov. BB test details. The test will be held Sat. Nov. 5, 10a, at Atlee Rec. The candidates that will test are: Luke Hajacos - to 1st Dan Trey Choiunard - to 1st Dan Sensei Mark Wilds - to 3rd Dan Trey has a conflict with the Nov. 5 date and will be tested in class on Tues. Nov 1. Luke and Sensei Mark will test on Nov.
